tool_description: An API that graps products of Apple that are on sale on another websites
title: Reconditioned Apple Devices

api_list.name: Get individual Reconditioned Apple Devices
api_list.description: Get Reconditioned Apple Devices from a specific website resource.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://reconditioned-apple-devices.p.rapidapi.com/products/{websiteid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reconditioned-apple-devices.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Reconditioned Apple Devices
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all Reconditioned Apple Devices
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://reconditioned-apple-devices.p.rapidapi.com/products"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "reconditioned-apple-devices.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
